ALTA 2011 Registration

Thanks to our generous sponsors (NICTA and ANU) we have been able to cover the registration and college accommodation (or equivalent) for student presenters.

The registration fee for other participants is $50, and this includes dinner at Delhi 6. Accomodation options are available at Canberra Langfest, please quote langfest when booking via the Canberra Langfest sites.

Please note: If you choose to attend without registering or to pay on-site you will be required to pay a $75 registration fee in cash.

Registrations are now closed.
